message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer anywhere else.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $12000 is a bit outside my budget. I'm happy to consider purchasing at $9500.  This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement.

I understand that $9500 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $11000. This is a fair price that still reflects the value I know you'll get from this product.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $11000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $10500, which is a fair price considering my budget.  I'm hoping we can reach an agreement at this price.

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $10500, but I'd like to propose a slight compromise. I'll sell it to you for $10750. This is a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the value you'll get from this product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10750 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm happy to pay $10250.  This is a fair price for both of us, and it would allow me to complete the purchase.  I'm hoping you can accept this final offer.

I can see you're really close to making a decision, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession. I'll sell the product to you for $10500, but I'll throw in some additional value to sweeten the deal. I'll include a premium service package that's worth $500. This way, you'll get the product and some extra benefits that will make it even more valuable to you. The total price will still be $10500, but I think you'll find it's a great deal.
